seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without 'Senior' prefix, but requires 4+ years experience which typically maps to mid-level in IC hierarchy

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on developing, maintaining, and testing big data solutions and pipelines

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on Azure Cloud Data Platform with specific services like DataBricks, Azure HDInsight, Azure Data Factory, Synapse - indicating cloud-focused data engineering

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or management responsibilities - purely individual contributor role focused on developing and maintaining data solutions

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple Azure services explicitly mentioned: Azure Cloud Data Platform, DataBricks, Azure HDInsight, Azure Data Factory, Synapse - clear Azure focus

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure ecosystem

processing_paradigm.evidence: Both streaming pipelines and batch processing mentioned - 'developing streaming pipelines' alongside traditional Spark batch processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as primary orchestration tool, which is Azure's native workflow orchestration service

storage_layer.evidence: Both warehouse (Synapse, SQL Server) and lake (HDFS, Hadoop ecosystem) storage patterns mentioned

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location 'Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India' mentioned, suggesting local/regional requirement for IBM Consulting delivery center

timezone_focus.evidence: India location specified, indicating work within Indian timezone (Asia/Kolkata) for local delivery center operations

relocation_required.evidence: Specific Bengaluru location mentioned for delivery center role, implying candidates need to be in or relocate to Bengaluru area

h1b_friendly.evidence: Position is in India, so H1B sponsorship not applicable - this is a domestic Indian hiring role

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based position, so US student visa categories (OPT/CPT) are not relevant for this role

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, only standard work authorization for India would be required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM Consulting delivery center role implies full-time employment (W2) rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, compensation, or perks mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned or implied

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of specific technical requirements with 'Minimum 4+ years' and 'Minimum 3 years' experience requirements, plus specific technology stack requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities around big data solutions, Spark framework, and Azure platform - not multi-role hybrid

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for mid-level data engineer role - 4+ years experience with specified technologies is appropriate skill level
